# Link Social



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                         | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | Default           |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- |
| `hideLabel`  | `hide-label`  | Show or hide label.                                                 | `BreakpointValues<boolean> or boolean or string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | `false`           |
| `href`       | `href`        | When providing an url then the component will be rendered as `<a>`. | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | `undefined`       |
| `icon`       | `icon`        | The icon shown.                                                     | `"logo-baidu" or "logo-delicious" or "logo-digg" or "logo-facebook" or "logo-foursquare" or "logo-gmail" or "logo-hatena" or "logo-instagram" or "logo-kaixin" or "logo-linkedin" or "logo-pinterest" or "logo-qq-share" or "logo-qq" or "logo-skyrock" or "logo-sohu" or "logo-tecent" or "logo-telegram" or "logo-tumblr" or "logo-twitter" or "logo-viber" or "logo-vk" or "logo-wechat" or "logo-weibo" or "logo-whatsapp" or "logo-xing" or "logo-yahoo" or "logo-youku" or "logo-youtube" or "logo-google"` | `'logo-facebook'` |
| `iconSource` | `icon-source` | A custom URL path to a custom social icon.                          | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | `undefined`       |
| `theme`      | `theme`       | Adapts the icon color when used on dark background.                 | `"dark" or "light"`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `'light'`         |
